black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, The King looking worried, talking to (character) who looks determined, holding up a sparkling, rainbow-colored ruler.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A round, messy monster made entirely of dripping ink blobs. It has a goofy, naughty grin. There are splashes on the floor around it. (character) is pointing her ruler at it.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A skinny, jagged goblin made of crumpled paper and tape. It is holding a stack of shiny books (the Proofs) in its crinkly claws. (character) looks angry and brave.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (character) using her ruler to straighten a piece of paper. The Ink-Blob and Paper-Jam monsters look sad and defeated, shrinking away into a dark corner.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (character) hugging a large stack of glowing, perfect books, big smile on her face, the machines in the background look quiet now.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A triumphant scene with (character) holding the books high in the air, the King is clapping, and cute castle animals are cheering around her, the sun is shining brightly.
